scenes.description: The members of ReGLOSS (Ao, Ririka, Hajime, Kanade, Raden) hold an MC session on a virtual stage, discussing their individual growth over the past year, Raden's songwriting, and introducing their new summer-themed song "MID-SUMMER ASTRAS" while sharing recording anecdotes and favorite choreography parts.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってるってことだよね
subtitles.english: That means you're working hard.

subtitles.original: ねー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: はい、莉々華は、あの、ちょっと心持ちが変わったなって思ってることがあって
subtitles.english: Yes, as for me, Ririka, there's something that I feel has changed in my mindset.

subtitles.original: 最初、本当にちょっとダンスが、特に苦手すぎて
subtitles.english: At first, I was really just too bad at dancing in particular.

subtitles.original: こういうライブとか、みんなの前で踊るみたいなときに、緊張だったりとか不安だったりがいっぱいあったんだけど
subtitles.english: When it came to lives like this or dancing in front of everyone, I had a lot of nervousness and anxiety.

subtitles.original: まぁ今回、とある曲を、踊らせていただいて、歌わせていただいたんですけど
subtitles.english: But this time, I had the chance to dance and sing a certain song.

subtitles.original: それを撮ったときに
subtitles.english: When we recorded that,

subtitles.original: なんか、不安だなって気持ちより、一緒にやってて楽しいなっていう気持ちのほうがなんかあった気がして
subtitles.english: I felt like I had more of a feeling of "this is fun to do together" than "I'm anxious."

subtitles.original: えー！嬉しいー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: えー、嬉しいって思った
subtitles.english: Yeah, I thought, "I'm happy."

subtitles.original: あら素敵じゃない、奥さん素敵よ、あなた
subtitles.english: Oh, how wonderful. Ma'am, you're wonderful.

subtitles.original: それ聞けたらこっちも嬉ちいよな
subtitles.english: Hearing that makes us happy too.

subtitles.original: ねえ！やったー！よかったねー！
subtitles.english: Right! Yay! That's great!

subtitles.original: これからもいっぱい歌って踊って、レッスンも頑張っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing and dancing a lot and work hard in lessons!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろ頑張ろ頑張ろ
subtitles.english: Let's do our best, let's do our best!

subtitles.original: らでんちゃんは？
subtitles.english: How about you, Raden-chan?

subtitles.original: らでんさ、作詞にはまってさ、この1年で
subtitles.english: Well, I've gotten into writing lyrics this past year.

subtitles.original: で、自分でね、特にラップ？
subtitles.english: And for myself, especially rap?

subtitles.original: やっぱね、言葉が好きなのよね、特に日本語が好きで
subtitles.english: I just love words, you know. I especially love the Japanese language.

subtitles.original: で、それでちょっと何かやりたいなと思って、自作のラップ書いて、自分のチャンネルに投稿したりとか
subtitles.english: So I wanted to do something with that, and I wrote my own rap and posted it on my channel.

subtitles.original: ねえ素敵だったよね！私たちの名前とかも入れてくれて
subtitles.english: Hey, that was wonderful! You even included our names.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう！言葉遊びがいっぱい！
subtitles.english: Right, right, right! Lots of wordplay!

subtitles.original: そう、なんかそういうね、言葉と音楽みたいなところで、自分の中で新しいチャレンジができたかなという1年でしたね
subtitles.english: Yeah, so it was a year where I think I was able to take on new challenges in that area of words and music.

subtitles.original: すごーい！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: もうみんなそれぞれにね、成長と挑戦を重ねた1年でございましたと
subtitles.english: It's been a year where each of us has had our share of growth and challenges.

subtitles.original: ございました！
subtitles.english: Indeed!

subtitles.original: でもね、まだまだね、伸び代もあるし、成長できる部分いっぱいあると思うから、これからも頑張ってこうね！
subtitles.english: But you know, we still have room to grow and plenty of areas to improve, so let's keep working hard!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろー！ダンス頑張るよー！
subtitles.english: Let's do it! I'll work hard on my dancing!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで今回は、先日発表されました、私たちReGLOSSの新曲「MID-SUMMER ASTRAS」をこの後披露させていただきます！
subtitles.english: Yes! So today, we're going to perform our new ReGLOSS song that was announced the other day, "MID-SUMMER ASTRAS"!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 3月にリリースした「さくらミラージュ」は、春の訪れを感じられる楽曲だったと思いますが
subtitles.english: Our song "Sakura Mirage," released in March, was a track that made you feel the arrival of spring.

subtitles.original: 今回の「MID-SUMMER ASTRAS」は、タイトル通り、タイトル通り...
subtitles.english: But this "MID-SUMMER ASTRAS" is, as the title suggests... as the title suggests...
Summer!!

subtitles.original: 暑っ！ふーや、熱！
subtitles.english: Hot! Phew, it's hot!

subtitles.original: 今これステージ立ってるけど日陰とかないからね！
subtitles.english: We're standing on stage right now, but there's no shade!

subtitles.original: もう日焼けやばいって！
subtitles.english: This sunburn is going to be terrible!

subtitles.original: でもやっぱ、こうReGLOSSが夏と一緒にここに帰ってきたっていう感じするよね！
subtitles.english: But it really feels like ReGLOSS has come back here along with the summer!

subtitles.original: 爽やかなメロディとね、心地よいリズムが夏の暑さを吹き飛ばしてくれるような一曲になってます！
subtitles.english: It's a song with a refreshing melody and a pleasant rhythm that'll blow away the summer heat!

subtitles.original: どんどん！で、みんなこの曲のイメージとか、なんかレコーディングのエピソードとかある？
subtitles.english: Boom boom! So, does anyone have an image of this song or any recording episodes?

subtitles.original: やっぱ夏だしすごい爽やかな曲だから、明るく楽しく爽やかにっていうのをすごいイメージしながら歌ったの覚えてる
subtitles.english: Since it's summer and a very refreshing song, I remember singing it while really imagining being bright, fun, and refreshing.

subtitles.original: あーいいいね！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's nice!

subtitles.original: 確かにそんな感じだった！
subtitles.english: It certainly felt like that!

subtitles.original: はいはい、奏ちゃんはどう？
subtitles.english: Yes, yes. How about you, Kanade-chan?

subtitles.original: この楽曲のサビに、「踊ってミッドサマー」っていうフレーズがあるんだけど
subtitles.english: In the chorus of this song, there's a phrase that goes "Odotte Midsummer."

subtitles.original: 歌うま！凄腕、歌うま出た今。
subtitles.english: You're good at singing! Wow, such a talented singer just now.

subtitles.original: ありがと
subtitles.english: Thanks.

subtitles.original: そのサンバをさ、かなで凄いリズムノリノリに乗るの好きだから
subtitles.english: I really like getting into the groove of that samba rhythm.

subtitles.original: 「踊ってミッドサマー！」ってやってさ、「サンバ！」ってあんまりになっちゃった？
subtitles.english: So when I did "Odotte Midsummer!", did I end up going a bit too "Samba!"?

subtitles.original: わかったわかった。
subtitles.english: I get it, I get it.

subtitles.original: ディレクターさんにね、お歌をやってくれるディレクターさんに、「いや、ちょっとサンバすぎるんで、ちょっと普通に歌ってください」って言われて
subtitles.english: The director, the one in charge of the vocals, told me, "Um, that's a bit too much samba, so please just sing it normally."

subtitles.original: 調整して歌ったの覚えてます
subtitles.english: I remember adjusting and singing it.

subtitles.original: めっちゃいいエピソードあるやん
subtitles.english: That's a great episode.

subtitles.original: 初めて聞いたよそれ、うちらにも話したことなかったじゃんそれ
subtitles.english: That's the first time I've heard that. You hadn't even told us that.

subtitles.original: あと振付で好きなとこがあって
subtitles.english: Also, there's a part of the choreography I like.

subtitles.original: やっぱサビのみんな好きやと思うけど、サビのここ！
subtitles.english: I think everyone likes the chorus, but this part of the chorus!

subtitles.original: 「踊ってミッドサマー」あの「ギコギコ」って覚えてる？
subtitles.english: "Odotte Midsummer," that "Giko Giko" part, do you remember?

subtitles.original: 紐でギコギコ、
subtitles.english: Sawing with a string,

subtitles.original: あ、なるほどね！
subtitles.english: Oh, I see!

subtitles.original: これが楽しくてめっちゃ好き！
subtitles.english: This is so fun, I love it!

subtitles.original: 気持ちいいもんね、ここ、バシッとハマるよね！
subtitles.english: It feels good, doesn't it? It clicks right into place!

subtitles.original: らでんちゃんはどう？
subtitles.english: How about you, Raden-chan?

subtitles.original: いっぱい練習しました！聞いてください！
subtitles.english: I practiced a lot! Please listen!

subtitles.original: もうダンスも歌もとにかく大変でした、いっぱい聞いてください！
subtitles.english: Both the dancing and singing were just so tough. Please listen to it a lot!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあそんな「MID-SUMMER ASTRAS」、この後みんなに見てもらおうと思うけど
subtitles.english: All right, then, we're about to show everyone "MID-SUMMER ASTRAS."

subtitles.original: もう早く見てもらいたいよね！そろそろね、MCだいぶ長くなってきちゃったしね！
subtitles.english: But we want you to see it as soon as possible! Besides, this MC segment is getting pretty long!
